description: Euler transform of reduced totient function psi(n), cf. A002322.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: G.f.: Product_{k=1..infinity} (1 - x^k)^(-psi(k)). a(n)=1/n*Sum_{k=1..n} a(n-k)*b(k), n>1, a(0)=1, b(k)=Sum_{d|k} d*psi(d), cf. A061258.
mathematica: nn = 20; b = Table[CarmichaelLambda[n], {n, nn}]; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1 - x^m)^b[[m]], {m, nn}], {x, 0, nn}], x] (* _T. D. Noe_, Jun 19 2012 *)
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 21 2001
